title: Ransomware Operators Exploit RMM Tools to Deploy Medusa and DragonForce

content.raw: Cybersecurity researchers at Zensec have exposed a sophisticated supply-chain attack campaign that weaponised trusted Remote Monitoring and Management (RMM) infrastructure to deploy ransomware across multiple UK organisations throughout early 2025. The investigation reveals how two prominent ransomware-as-a-service groups exploited critical vulnerabilities in SimpleHelp RMM software to breach downstream customers through their managed service providers. The […] The post Ransomware Operators Exploit RMM Tools to Deploy Medusa and DragonForce appeared first on GBHackers Security | #1 Globally Trusted Cyber Security News Platform.
